016package io.micronaut.maven;
017
018import com.google.common.io.FileWriteMode;
019import io.micronaut.maven.core.MicronautRuntime;
020import io.micronaut.maven.jib.JibMicronautExtension;
021import io.micronaut.maven.services.ApplicationConfigurationService;
022import io.micronaut.maven.services.DockerService;
023import io.micronaut.maven.jib.JibConfigurationService;
024import org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact;
025import org.apache.maven.artifact.versioning.ArtifactVersion;
026import org.apache.maven.artifact.versioning.DefaultArtifactVersion;
027import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
028import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecution;
029import org.apache.maven.plugin.PluginParameterExpressionEvaluator;
030import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Parameter;
031import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
032
033import java.io.File;
034import java.io.IOException;
035import java.nio.charset.Charset;
036import java.nio.file.Files;
037import java.nio.file.StandardCopyOption;
038import java.util.*;
039import java.util.stream.Collectors;
040
041import static io.micronaut.maven.services.ApplicationConfigurationService.DEFAULT_PORT;
042
043/**
044 * Abstract base class for mojos related to Docker files and builds.
045 *
046 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
047 * @author Iván López
048 * @since 1.1
049 */
050public abstract class AbstractDockerMojo extends AbstractMicronautMojo {
051
052    public static final String LATEST_TAG = "latest";
053    // GlibC 2.34 is used by native image 17
054    public static final String DEFAULT_BASE_IMAGE_GRAALVM_RUN = "cgr.dev/chainguard/wolfi-base:latest";
055    public static final String MOSTLY_STATIC_NATIVE_IMAGE_GRAALVM_FLAG = "-H:+StaticExecutableWithDynamicLibC";
056    public static final String ARM_ARCH = "aarch64";
057    public static final String X86_64_ARCH = "x64";
058    public static final String DEFAULT_ORACLE_LINUX_VERSION = "ol9";
059    public static final String ORACLE_CLOUD_FUNCTION_DEFAULT_CMD = "CMD [\"io.micronaut.oraclecloud.function.http.HttpFunction::handleRequest\"]";
060
061    protected final MavenProject mavenProject;
062    protected final JibConfigurationService jibConfigurationService;
063    protected final ApplicationConfigurationService applicationConfigurationService;
064    protected final DockerService dockerService;
065    protected final PluginParameterExpressionEvaluator expressionEvaluator;
066
067
068    /**
069     * Additional arguments that will be passed to the <code>native-image</code> executable. Note that this will only
070     * be used when using a packaging of type <code>docker-native</code>. For <code>native-image</code> packaging
071     * you should use the
072     * <a href="https://www.graalvm.org/reference-manual/native-image/NativeImageMavenPlugin/#maven-plugin-customization">
073     * Native Image Maven Plugin
074     * </a> configuration options.
075     */
076    @Parameter(property = "micronaut.native-image.args")
077    protected List<String> nativeImageBuildArgs;
078
079    /**
080     * List of additional arguments that will be passed to the application.
081     */
082    @Parameter(property = RunMojo.MN_APP_ARGS)
083    protected List<String> appArguments;
084
085    /**
086     * The main class of the application, as defined in the
087     * <a href="https://www.mojohaus.org/exec-maven-plugin/java-mojo.html#mainClass">Exec Maven Plugin</a>.
088     */
089    @Parameter(defaultValue = RunMojo.EXEC_MAIN_CLASS, required = true)
090    protected String mainClass;
091
092    /**
093     * Whether to produce a static native image when using <code>docker-native</code> packaging.
094     */
095    @Parameter(defaultValue = "false", property = "micronaut.native-image.static")
096    protected Boolean staticNativeImage;
097
098    /**
099     * The target runtime of the application.
100     */
101    @Parameter(property = MicronautRuntime.PROPERTY, defaultValue = "NONE")
102    protected String micronautRuntime;
103
104    /**
105     * The Docker image used to run the native image.
106     * @since 1.2
107     */
108    @Parameter(property = "micronaut.native-image.base-image-run", defaultValue = DEFAULT_BASE_IMAGE_GRAALVM_RUN)
109    protected String baseImageRun;
110
111    /**
112     * The version of Oracle Linux to use as a native-compile base when building a native image inside a Docker container.
113     */
114    @Parameter(property = "micronaut.native-image.ol.version", defaultValue = DEFAULT_ORACLE_LINUX_VERSION)
115    protected String oracleLinuxVersion;
116
117    /**
118     * Networking mode for the RUN instructions during build.
119     *
120     * @since 4.0.0
121     */
122    @Parameter(property = "docker.networkMode")
123    protected String networkMode;
124
125    protected AbstractDockerMojo(MavenProject mavenProject, JibConfigurationService jibConfigurationService,
126                                 ApplicationConfigurationService applicationConfigurationService,
127                                 DockerService dockerService, MavenSession mavenSession, MojoExecution mojoExecution) {
128        this.mavenProject = mavenProject;
129        this.jibConfigurationService = jibConfigurationService;
130        this.applicationConfigurationService = applicationConfigurationService;
131        this.dockerService = dockerService;
132        this.expressionEvaluator = new PluginParameterExpressionEvaluator(mavenSession, mojoExecution);
133    }
134
135    /**
136     * @return the Java version from either the <code>maven.compiler.target</code> property or the <code>java.version</code> property.
137     */
138    protected ArtifactVersion javaVersion() {
139        return new DefaultArtifactVersion(Optional.ofNullable(mavenProject.getProperties().getProperty("maven.compiler.target")).orElse(System.getProperty("java.version")));
140    }
141
142    /**
143     * @return the GraalVM version from the <code>graalvm.version</code> property, which is expected to come from the
144     * Micronaut Parent POM.
145     */
146    protected String graalVmVersion() {
147        return mavenProject.getProperties().getProperty("graal.version");
148    }
149
150    /**
151     * @return the JVM version to use for GraalVM.
152     */
153    protected String graalVmJvmVersion() {
154        return javaVersion().getMajorVersion() == 17 ? "17" : "21";
155    }
156
157    /**
158     * @return the OS architecture to use for GraalVM depending on the <code>os.arch</code> system property.
159     */
160    protected String graalVmArch() {
161        return isArm() ? ARM_ARCH : X86_64_ARCH;
162    }
163
164    /**
165     * @return the base FROM image for the native image.
166     */
167    protected String getFrom() {
168        if (Boolean.TRUE.equals(staticNativeImage)) {
169            return getFromImage().orElse("ghcr.io/graalvm/native-image-community:" + graalVmJvmVersion() + "-muslib-" + oracleLinuxVersion);
170        } else {
171            return getFromImage().orElse("ghcr.io/graalvm/native-image-community:" + graalVmJvmVersion() + "-" + oracleLinuxVersion);
172        }
173    }
174
175    /**
176     * Check os.arch against known ARM architecture identifiers.
177     *
178     * @return true if we think we're running on an arm JDK
179     */
180    protected boolean isArm() {
181        return switch (System.getProperty("os.arch")) {
182            case ARM_ARCH, "arm64" -> true;
183            default -> false;
184        };
185    }
186
187    /**
188     * @return the base image from the jib configuration (if any).
189     */
190    protected Optional<String> getFromImage() {
191        return jibConfigurationService.getFromImage();
192    }
193
194    /**
195     * @return the Docker image tags by looking at the Jib plugin configuration.
196     */
197    protected Set<String> getTags() {
198        Set<String> tags = new HashSet<>();
199        Optional<String> toImageOptional = jibConfigurationService.getToImage();
200        String imageName = mavenProject.getArtifactId();
201        if (toImageOptional.isPresent()) {
202            String toImage = toImageOptional.get();
203            if (toImage.contains(":")) {
204                tags.add(toImage);
205                imageName = toImageOptional.get().split(":")[0];
206            } else {
207                tags.add(toImage + ":" + LATEST_TAG);
208                imageName = toImage;
209            }
210        } else {
211            tags.add(imageName + ":" + LATEST_TAG);
212        }
213        for (String tag : jibConfigurationService.getTags()) {
214            if (LATEST_TAG.equals(tag) && tags.stream().anyMatch(t -> t.contains(LATEST_TAG))) {
215                continue;
216            }
217            tags.add(String.format("%s:%s", imageName, tag));
218        }
219        return tags.stream()
220                .map(this::evaluateExpression)
221                .collect(Collectors.toSet());
222    }
223
224    private String evaluateExpression(String expression) {
225        try {
226            return expressionEvaluator.evaluate(expression, String.class).toString();
227        } catch (Exception e) {
228            return expression;
229        }
230    }
231
232    /**
233     * @return the application port to expose by looking at the application configuration.
234     */
235    protected String getPort() {
236        String port = applicationConfigurationService.getServerPort();
237        return "-1".equals(port) ? DEFAULT_PORT : port;
238    }
239
240    /**
241     * Copy project dependencies to a <code>target/dependency</code> directory.
242     */
243    @SuppressWarnings("ResultOfMethodCallIgnored")
244    protected void copyDependencies() throws IOException {
245        List<String> imageClasspathScopes = Arrays.asList(Artifact.SCOPE_COMPILE, Artifact.SCOPE_RUNTIME);
246        mavenProject.setArtifactFilter(artifact -> imageClasspathScopes.contains(artifact.getScope()));
247        File target = new File(mavenProject.getBuild().getDirectory(), "dependency");
248        if (!target.exists()) {
249            target.mkdirs();
250        }
251        for (Artifact dependency : mavenProject.getArtifacts()) {
252            Files.copy(dependency.getFile().toPath(), target.toPath().resolve(dependency.getFile().getName()), StandardCopyOption.REPLACE_EXISTING);
253        }
254    }
255
256    /**
257     * @return the Docker CMD command.
258     */
259    protected String getCmd() {
260        return "CMD [" +
261                appArguments.stream()
262                        .map(s -> "\"" + s + "\"")
263                        .collect(Collectors.joining(", ")) +
264                "]";
265    }
266
267    /**
268     * @return Networking mode for the RUN instructions during build (if any).
269     */
270    protected Optional<String> getNetworkMode() {
271        return Optional.ofNullable(networkMode);
272    }
273
274    /**
275     * @return the base image to use for the Dockerfile.
276     */
277    protected String getBaseImage() {
278        return JibMicronautExtension.determineBaseImage(JibMicronautExtension.getJdkVersion(mavenProject), MicronautRuntime.valueOf(micronautRuntime.toUpperCase()).getBuildStrategy());
279    }
280
281    /**
282     * Adds cmd to docker oracle cloud function file.
283     * @param dockerfile the docker file
284     */
285    protected void oracleCloudFunctionCmd(File dockerfile) throws IOException {
286        if (appArguments != null && !appArguments.isEmpty()) {
287            getLog().info("Using application arguments: " + appArguments);
288            com.google.common.io.Files.asCharSink(dockerfile, Charset.defaultCharset(), FileWriteMode.APPEND).write(System.lineSeparator() + getCmd());
289        } else  {
290            com.google.common.io.Files.asCharSink(dockerfile, Charset.defaultCharset(), FileWriteMode.APPEND).write(System.lineSeparator() + ORACLE_CLOUD_FUNCTION_DEFAULT_CMD);
291        }
292    }
293
294}
